ami.description: ID of AMI to use for the instance,Must with prefix ami-
ami.title: Ami

ami_ssm_parameter.description: SSM parameter name for the AMI ID
ami_ssm_parameter.title: Ami Ssm Parameter

associate_public_ip_address.description: Whether to associate a public IP address with an instance in a VPC
associate_public_ip_address.title: Associate Public Ip Address

availability_zone.description: AZ to start the instance in
availability_zone.title: Availability Zone

cpu_core_count.description: Sets the number of CPU cores for an instance
cpu_core_count.title: Cpu Core Count

cpu_options.description: Defines CPU options to apply to the instance at launch time
cpu_options.title: Cpu Options

cpu_threads_per_core.description: Sets the number of CPU threads per core for an instance
cpu_threads_per_core.title: Cpu Threads Per Core

create_spot_instance.description: Depicts if the instance is a spot instance
create_spot_instance.title: Create Spot Instance

credit_specification.description: Customize the credit specification of the instance
credit_specification.title: Credit Specification

disable_api_stop.description: If true, enables EC2 Instance Stop Protection
disable_api_stop.title: Disable Api Stop

disable_api_termination.description: If true, enables EC2 Instance Termination Protection
disable_api_termination.title: Disable Api Termination

ebs_block_device.description: Additional EBS block devices to attach to the instance
ebs_block_device.title: Ebs Block Device

ebs_optimized.description: If true, the launched EC2 instance will be EBS-optimized
ebs_optimized.title: Ebs Optimized

enclave_options_enabled.description: Whether Nitro Enclaves will be enabled on the instance
enclave_options_enabled.title: Enclave Options Enabled

ephemeral_block_device.description: Customize Ephemeral (also known as Instance Store) volumes on the instance
ephemeral_block_device.title: Ephemeral Block Device

get_password_data.description: If true, wait for password data to become available and retrieve it
get_password_data.title: Get Password Data

hibernation.description: If true, the launched EC2 instance will support hibernation
hibernation.title: Hibernation

host_id.description: ID of a dedicated host that the instance will be assigned to
host_id.title: Host Id

iam_instance_profile.description: IAM Instance Profile to launch the instance with
iam_instance_profile.title: Iam Instance Profile

instance_type.description: The type of instance to start
instance_type.title: Instance Type

ipv6_address_count.description: A number of IPv6 addresses to associate with the primary network interface
ipv6_address_count.title: Ipv6 Address Count

ipv6_addresses.description: Specify one or more IPv6 addresses from the range of the subnet to associate with the primary network interface
ipv6_addresses.title: Ipv6 Addresses

key_name.description: Key name of the Key Pair to use for the instance
key_name.title: Key Name

launch_template.description: Specifies a Launch Template to configure the instance
launch_template.title: Launch Template

maintenance_options.description: The maintenance options for the instance
maintenance_options.title: Maintenance Options

metadata_options.description: Customize the metadata options of the instance
metadata_options.title: Metadata Options

monitoring.description: If true, the launched EC2 instance will have detailed monitoring enabled
monitoring.title: Monitoring

name.description: Name to be used on EC2 instance created
name.title: Name

network_interface.description: Customize network interfaces to be attached at instance boot time
network_interface.title: Network Interface

placement_group.description: The Placement Group to start the instance in
placement_group.title: Placement Group

private_dns.description: The private DNS name assigned to the instance
private_dns.title: Private Dns

private_dns_name_options.description: Customize the private DNS name options of the instance
private_dns_name_options.title: Private Dns Name Options

private_ip.description: Private IP address to associate with the instance in a VPC
private_ip.title: Private Ip

public_dns.description: The public DNS name assigned to the instance
public_dns.title: Public Dns

public_ip.description: The public IP address assigned to the instance
public_ip.title: Public Ip

root_block_device.description: Customize details about the root block device of the instance
root_block_device.title: Root Block Device

secondary_private_ips.description: A list of secondary private IPv4 addresses to assign to the instance's primary network interface
secondary_private_ips.title: Secondary Private Ips

source_dest_check.description: Controls if traffic is routed to the instance when the destination address does not match the instance
source_dest_check.title: Source Dest Check

spot_block_duration_minutes.description: The required duration for the Spot instances, in minutes
spot_block_duration_minutes.title: Spot Block Duration Minutes

spot_instance_interruption_behavior.description: Indicates Spot instance behavior when it is interrupted
spot_instance_interruption_behavior.title: Spot Instance Interruption Behavior

spot_launch_group.description: A launch group is a group of spot instances that launch together and terminate together
spot_launch_group.title: Spot Launch Group

spot_price.description: The maximum price to request on the spot market
spot_price.title: Spot Price

spot_type.description: If set to one-time, after the instance is terminated, the spot request will be closed
spot_type.title: Spot Type

spot_valid_from.description: The start date and time of the request, in UTC RFC3339 format
spot_valid_from.title: Spot Valid From

spot_valid_until.description: The end date and time of the request, in UTC RFC3339 format
spot_valid_until.title: Spot Valid Until

spot_wait_for_fulfillment.description: If set, Terraform will wait for the Spot Request to be fulfilled
spot_wait_for_fulfillment.title: Spot Wait For Fulfillment

subnet_id.description: The VPC Subnet ID to launch in
subnet_id.title: Subnet Id

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource
tags.title: Tags

timeouts.description: Define maximum timeout for creating, updating, and deleting EC2 instance resources
timeouts.title: Timeouts

user_data.description: The user data to provide when launching the instance
user_data.title: User Data

user_data_base64.description: Can be used instead of user_data to pass base64-encoded binary data directly
user_data_base64.title: User Data Base64

user_data_replace_on_change.description: When used in combination with user_data or user_data_base64 will trigger a destroy and recreate when set to true
user_data_replace_on_change.title: User Data Replace On Change

volume_tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the devices created by the instance at launch time
volume_tags.title: Volume Tags

vpc_security_group_ids.description: A list of security group IDs to associate with
vpc_security_group_ids.title: Vpc Security Group Ids

transform.expression: data.images[*].{value: image_id, label: name, description: description}
data.instance_types[*].{value: instance_type, label: instance_type, vcpu: vcpu_info.default_vcpus, memory: memory_info.size_in_mib}
data.subnets[*].{value: subnet_id, label: tags.Name || subnet_id, group: availability_zone}
data.security_groups[*].{value: group_id, label: group_name, description: description}
data.instance_profiles[*].{value: instance_profile_name, label: instance_profile_name, arn: arn}

items.description: The ID of the instance
items.name: id

items.description: The ARN of the instance
items.name: arn

items.description: Capacity reservation specification of the instance
items.name: capacity_reservation_specification

items.description: The state of the instance
items.name: instance_state

items.description: The ARN of the Outpost the instance is assigned to
items.name: outpost_arn

items.description: Base-64 encoded encrypted password data for the instance. Useful for getting the administrator password for instances running Microsoft Windows. This attribute is only exported if `get_password_data` is true
items.name: password_data

items.description: The ID of the instance's primary network interface
items.name: primary_network_interface_id

items.description: The private DNS name assigned to the instance. Can only be used inside the Amazon EC2, and only available if you've enabled DNS hostnames for your VPC
items.name: private_dns

items.description: The public DNS name assigned to the instance. For EC2-VPC, this is only available if you've enabled DNS hostnames for your VPC
items.name: public_dns

items.description: The public IP address assigned to the instance, if applicable.
items.name: public_ip

items.description: The private IP address assigned to the instance
items.name: private_ip

items.description: The IPv6 address assigned to the instance, if applicable
items.name: ipv6_addresses

items.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider default_tags configuration block
items.name: tags_all

items.description: The current bid status of the Spot Instance Request
items.name: spot_bid_status

items.description: The current request state of the Spot Instance Request
items.name: spot_request_state

items.description: The Instance ID (if any) that is currently fulfilling the Spot Instance request
items.name: spot_instance_id

items.description: AMI ID that was used to create the instance
items.name: ami

items.description: The availability zone of the created instance
items.name: availability_zone

items.description: Map of EBS volumes created and their attributes
items.name: ebs_volumes

items.description: The name of the IAM role
items.name: iam_role_name

items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the IAM role
items.name: iam_role_arn

items.description: Stable and unique string identifying the IAM role
items.name: iam_role_unique_id

items.description: ARN assigned by AWS to the instance profile
items.name: iam_instance_profile_arn

items.description: Instance profile's ID
items.name: iam_instance_profile_id

items.description: Stable and unique string identifying the IAM instance profile
items.name: iam_instance_profile_unique

items.description: Root block device information
items.name: root_block_device

items.description: EBS block device information
items.name: ebs_block_device

items.description: Ephemeral block device information
items.name: ephemeral_block_device

items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the security group
items.name: security_group_arn

items.description: ID of the security group
items.name: security_group_id
